Pregabalin

Legal Status

by Erowid

U.S. FEDERAL LAW #

Caution : All legal information should be verified through other sources. [see below]

U.S. FEDERAL LEGAL SUMMARY Pregabalin REGULATED Yes STATUS Scheduled SCHEDULE Schedule V CLASSIFICATION Depressant


                    Context: 
                    This chunk provides detailed legal information on pregabalin, including its scheduling status under U.S. federal law (Schedule V), international classifications, and relevant legal references. It is part of the broader pharmaceuticals and drugs index on the webpage, offering critical legal context for understanding pregabalin's regulated status.

metadata.title: Erowid Pregabalin (Lyrica) Vault : Legal Status
metadata.description: Information on the legal status of pregabalin (lyrica).

content:
Drug: Pregabalin | cid: 5486971
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on the legal status of pregabalin (lyrica).
Erowid name: pregabalin
Category: PHARMS
Field: Law

                    Text: 
                    U.S. FEDERAL LEGAL SUMMARY Pregabalin REGULATED Yes STATUS Scheduled SCHEDULE Schedule V CLASSIFICATION Depressant

Pregabalin is Schedule V in the U.S. This means it is illegal to sell without a license and illegal to possess without a valid license or prescription.

INTERNATIONAL LAW #

Finland #

Pregabalin is a controlled substance as of June 1, 2023. See https://www.fimea.fi/-/uusia-aineita-huumausainevalvontaan. (thanks survival) (Last updated Mar 3 2023)

E.U. #

Pregabalin is available as a prescription medicine in E.U. countries. (thanks A)

U.K. #

Effective Apr 1 2019, pregabalin is a class C controlled drug in the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland. [Pregabalin/Lyrica reclassified to a class C drug, BBC News, Apr 2019] (thanks Alx)

If you have information about the legal status of this substance in any other country, please let us know.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #


                    Context: 
                    This excerpt provides a comprehensive legal status overview of pregabalin, including its scheduling under U.S. federal law and regulations in Finland, the E.U., and the U.K., along with advisory disclaimers. It is a detailed subsection within the larger "Pharmaceuticals" and "Law" sections of the webpage, offering essential information for users researching drug legality worldwide.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid legal information is a summary of data gathered from site visitors, government documents, websites, and other resources. We are not lawyers and can not guarantee the accuracy of the information provided here. We do our best to keep this information correct and up-to-date, but laws are complex and constantly changing. Laws may also vary from one jurisdiction to another (county, state, country, etc)...this list is not comprehensive.

RELATED RESOURCES #

RELATED LINKS #
